duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilizing Solidworks to create new designs for Class II, disposable medical devices.
Researching, developing, and implementing new designs and establishing design control processes and documentation.
Working cross functionally with other R&D and Engineer teams to design and develop new products and lead projects to the manufacturing phases.
Involvement in plastics engineering, polymers, molding, medical disposables, and solid molding.
Presenting all findings to internal stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Materials Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
